uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.ssl

Class CachedSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.net.SocketFactory
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.ssl.CachedSocketFactory

  • public class CachedSocketFactory
extends javax.net.SocketFactory
    A custom SocketFactory that can be instantiated by reflection (As required by JNDI) but generates SSL sockets cached in a thread-local
    Author:
    spb
    See Also:
    SSLService
